plot outline: Vikram is an unemployed rich brat who lives with his big joint family. A young girl called Teju comes by to his house for help when Vikram is home alone. An unsuspecting Vikram and his family members end up in a honey trap. What happens thereafter?
title: Hagalu Kanasu
plot: An ardent daydreamer Vicky has one of his wildest fantasies come true when the gorgeous Teju walks into his life.

Vikram is an unemployed rich brat who lives with his big joint family. A young girl called Teju comes by to his house for help when Vikram is home alone. An unsuspecting Vikram and his family members end up in a honey trap. What happens thereafter?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
